EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email requesting Opportunity submission approval from manager - Grantee
EmailTemplate.name: Funding Opportunity Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Review the Announcement #{!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification to review the Announcement # {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementName__c}.
Hello {!Announcement__c.ProgramApprover__c},
This email is to inform you that the Funding Opportunity {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementName__c} has been assigned to you for review and approval.
{!User.Profile} comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
To access the task and take relevant action, click the following link: {!Announcement__c.Link}
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} at {!User.Phone} or {!User.Email}.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely
EGMS Team
